before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"ctnu9","text":"The experimental animals should be screened for any ailment at the commencement of the experiment using the laboratory’s recommended procedure and cleared of any ailment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2sv0i","text":"The aim of this experiment is to assess the potential of a plant extract to fight off Trypanosoma species, including Trypanosoma brucei brucei, Trypanosoma evansi, etc., by testing it at concentrations ranging from 006.25 to 400.00 mg/mL. The results obtained indicate that the plant extract may be a useful tool in the management of trypanosomiasis, but further studies are required to confirm its effectiveness.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":117,"length":26},{"style":"italic","offset":144,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

Any action you take or refrain from taking using or relying upon the information presented here is strictly at your own risk. You agree that neither the Company nor any of the authors, contributors, administrators, or anyone else associated with protocols.io, can be held responsible for your use of the information contained in or linked to this protocol or any of our Sites/Apps and Services.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":160,"length":12},{"key":1,"offset":631,"length":12}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"http://protocols.io"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"http://protocols.io"}}}}

references.title: Trypanosoma brucei: a rapid "matching" method for estimating the host's parasitemia
Trypanosoma brucei: A rapid “matching” method for estimating the host's parasitemia
Options for field diagnosis of human african trypanosomiasis.
references.authors: Chappuis F, Loutan L, Simarro P, Lejon V, Büscher P

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d9k4n","text":"The infected rat to undergo euthanasia must have attained a blood parasitemia of log 8.4 or higher","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eni0q","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f3ue0","text":".","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"citation","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"authors":"Herbert W.J., Lumsden W.H.R.","can_edit":true,"date":218678400,"doi":"https://doi.org/10.1016/0014-4894(76)90110-7","guid":"CA071E067C8F11EE9C1A0A58A9FEAC02","journal":"Experimental Parasitology","protocol_guid":"","title":"Trypanosoma brucei: a rapid \"matching\" method for estimating the host's parasitemia"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9tb91","text":"Euthanatized animal’s blood was dissolved in heparin (  of heparin per   of blood) and mixed with glucose (  of glucose per   of blood).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":54,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":71,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":107,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":124,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"djs4r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6pj39","text":"Then, aseptically, a clean micropipette transfers the blood ( ) to a clean, sterile microtiter plate into multiple wells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":61,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c52tv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3sm0","text":"To the two wells containing blood, the same volume (i.e.,  ) of the highest drug concentration was added, respectively.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":58,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2llfo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"m048","text":"The negative control blood was mixed with the dilutant used to prepare the various concentrations (i.e., dextrose-saline or water).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eul75","text":"The positive tests were also performed with the standard recommended concentrations\nof a commercially available trypanocide drug.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"962ip","text":"Step 4 was repeated for the other different concentrations available.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c2cet","text":"To produce a stock   solution of  for the extract, weigh  ( ) of the extract, which was solubilized in 1 mL of dimethylsulfoxide (DMSO) solution and made up to   in dextrose saline/normal saline.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":19,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":32,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":56,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":59,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":160,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"sample","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"blocks":null,"entityMap":null}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":204}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1000","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":5}},"4":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"9","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"79ug0","text":"Serial dilutions were made for the remaining concentration of ,  ,    and   of the extracts were made in Dextrose saline (freshly prepared).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":61,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":64,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":67,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":74,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"50","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":204}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"25","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":204}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"12.5","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":204}},"3":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"6.25","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":204}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ejqpu","text":"At    5-minute interval, a drop of blood is taken from each well and smeared on a clean glass slide. then observe under a microscope at 400x for signs of motility unique to Trypanosoma spp.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":173,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":3,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6vnd5","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"859j8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"97ka0","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8isp9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4k2a2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"citation","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"authors":"Herbert W.J., Lumsden W.H.R.","can_edit":true,"date":218678400,"doi":"https://doi.org/10.1016/0014-4894(76)90110-7","guid":"869DF6E37C9111EE9C1A0A58A9FEAC02","journal":"Experimental Parasitology","protocol_guid":"","title":"Trypanosoma brucei: A rapid “matching” method for estimating the host's parasitemia"}},"2":{"type":"citation","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"align":"","authors":"Chappuis F, Loutan L, Simarro P, Lejon V, Büscher P","can_edit":true,"date":1104537600,"doi":"https://doi.org/10.1128/cmr.18.1.133-146.2005","guid":"390162226E8C42F1B13F1E264C7239B9","id":0,"journal":"Clinical Microbiology Reviews","protocol_guid":"","protocol_id":0,"title":"Options for field diagnosis of human african trypanosomiasis."}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3naqi","text":"The above step is repeated with each well. Till motility stopped in all wells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
